mapper.select: SELECT e.*, a.*, c.*, w.WORKINGHOUR_WT, w.WORKINGHOUR_LT FROM EMPLOYEE e INNER JOIN ANNUAL a ON e.EMPLOYEE_CD = a.EMPLOYEE_CD INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE c ON e.EMPLOYEE_DP = c.COMMON_CC INNER JOIN WORKINGHOUR w ON e.WORKINGHOUR_ID = w.WORKINGHOUR_ID WHERE e.EMPLOYEE_CD = #{currentCd} AND a.ANNUAL_YR = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND c.COMMON_GC = 'DEPARTMENT'
